Package edu.wpi.first.math.geometry

Class Twist3d

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Twist3d
  • public class Twist3d
extends java.lang.Object
    A change in distance along a 3D arc since the last pose update. We can use ideas from differential calculus to create new Pose3ds from a Twist3d and vise versa.

    A Twist can be used to represent a difference between two poses.

      • Twist3d

        public Twist3d​(double dx,
               double dy,
               double dz,
               double droll,
               double dpitch,
               double dyaw)
        Constructs a Twist3d with the given values.
        Parameters:
        dx - Change in x direction relative to robot.
        dy - Change in y direction relative to robot.
        dz - Change in z direction relative to robot.
        droll - Change in roll relative to the robot.
        dpitch - Change in pitch relative to the robot.
        dyaw - Change in yaw relative to the robot.
